amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the President to submit to Congress an annual unclassified statement of the aggregate amount of intelligence expenditures for the current and succeeding fiscal years beginning with the submission of the budget for FY 1999.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require the President, at the time of his annual budget request, to submit to Congress a separate, unclassified statement of intelligence appropriations and proposed appropriations for the next two fiscal years.

action.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 237 (Roll No. 254).
